title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Cognitive Load Theory and Measurement Methods: Experimental Approaches for Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and foundational cognitive psychology concepts
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish three types of cognitive load (intrinsic, extraneous, germane) and analyze application cases in mathematical problem-solving
Learners can conduct multidimensional cognitive load assessments using self-report surveys (mental effort, task difficulty) and physiological measurements (EDA, PPG)
Learners can design cognitive load optimization strategies in VR-based math task simulations and validate effectiveness based on real-world data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
